name: Neopets Ad Blocker
description: Removes all ads on every neopets page. Also removes the nickelodeon topbar.
additional_info:
AdBlock Plus (for chrome) is recommended for blocking ads on every site:
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/adblock-plus/cfhdojbkjhnklbpkdaibdccddilifddb?utm_source=chrome-ntp-icon
